template.template: App Skype for business Mediation Role
template.name: App Skype for business Mediation Role
template.description:
## Description
This template assesses the status and overall health of services as well as the performance of the Mediation Microsoft Skype for Business Server 2015. Note: You need to set thresholds for these counters according to your environment. It is recommended to monitor these counters for some period of time to understand potential value ranges and then set the thresholds accordingly. This documentation is based on: https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg398616.aspx.
## Overview
Lync 2013 Mediation role template

item.name: Global Counters: Current audio channels with PSM quality reporting
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Global Counters\- Current audio channels with PSM quality reporting"]
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of active channels that are having Phase Shift Modulation (PSM) quality reported. Calculating PSM quality has a processing overhead so this should be taken into account when measuring performance.

item.name: Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Global Counters\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy"]
item.description: This component monitor returns the number of calls that failed because of an unexpected response from the Front End Server. The returned value should be as low as possible.

trigger.name: Call failed caused by unexpected interaction from a proxy

item.name: Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Global Per Gateway Counters(_Total)\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway"]
item.description: This component monitor returns the number of calls that failed because of an unexpected response from a gateway peer. The returned value should be as low as possible.

trigger.name: Call failed caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway

item.name: Health Indices: Load Call Failure Index
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Health Indices\- Load Call Failure Index"]
item.description: This component monitor returns the scaled index between zero and 100 that is related to all call failures due to Global Health Index as a heavy load.

trigger.name: Lync load call failure index too high

item.name: Inbound Calls: Active media bypass calls
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Inbound Calls(_total)\- Active media bypass calls"]
item.description: This component monitor returns the number of media bypass calls in progress.

item.name: Inbound Calls: Current
item.description: This component monitor returns the number of inbound calls in progress.

item.name: Media Relay: Media Connectivity Check Failure
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Media Relay\- Media Connectivity Check Failure"]
item.description: This component monitor returns the number of calls where media connectivity between the Mediation Server and the remote endpoints could not be established. The returned value should be as low as possible.

trigger.name: Lync media connectiviti check failures too high

item.name: Outbound Calls: Active media bypass calls
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Outbound Calls(_total)\- Active media bypass calls"]
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of active calls going through Mediation Server that are in Media Bypass mode. Calls using Media Bypass use significantly fewer Mediation Server resources because the media is not flowing through the Mediation Server.

item.name: Outbound Calls: Current
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of active calls going through the Mediation Server.

item.name: Service: Lync Server Replica Replicator Agent
item.key: service.info["Lync Server Replica Replicator Agent", state]

trigger.name: Lync Server Replica Replicator Agent service stopped

item.host: App Skype for business Mediation Role
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Inbound Calls(_total)\- Active media bypass calls"]

item.host: App Skype for business Mediation Role
App Skype for business Mediation Role
item.key: perf_counter["\LS:MediationServer - Outbound Calls(_total)\- Active media bypass calls"]
